attributes.action: Change the skate ramp in Elvetham Heath a proper skatepark.
attributes.background: The Skate ramp at Elvetham Heath is beginning to rot away and I feel this is effecting the riding community. We should have a place where we can ride. We shouldn’t have to ride only when the weather is good because the skate ramp is wet. If we had a skatepark we would be able to progress.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of Elvetham Heath parish council, not the UK Parliament or Government. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
